key_risks: Weaker-Than-Expected Performance due to macroeconomic headwinds in China and customer destocking
Supply Chain Vulnerabilities from global disruptions and geopolitical tensions
Debt Management challenges with recent issuance of $125 million in senior secured notes
Intense Competition from major players and low-cost manufacturers
Dependence on Healthcare Spending making it vulnerable to economic downturns and policy changes
controversies: Failed preliminary injunction motion in a patent dispute
Exposure to cybersecurity breaches and potential regulatory action
social_issues: Commitment to fair labor practices, health and safety, and environmental responsibility
governance_issues: Regulatory Compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
Financial restructuring efforts and debt management
